body: Why is it always one chapter ?

@Yetzu45 I think that you are right. She is not getting taller, it is just perspective/appearance of dominance. She is just dominating him. Btw can anyone here translate the last few pages? The crappy online translator doesn't work, and i can't find those panels in English. Not asking for a full translation just a gist.
@Ecchi kun I think it's the perspective, probably used to insinuate the hight difference
I really apreciate the size diference of the last feet pages, but wtf happened here? he shrinks or she become bigger?
Compare page 7 and page 76 height difference lmao
